name: Paperface
description:
Paperface - 0.09.1

Paperface is an endless top-down 2D shooter

Future features and additions (currently in development):
- Timer and Highscores
- More upgrades
- Visible enemy spawn points
- Start of game countdown
- Waves mode (different from the current Endless mode)
- Controller support
- More enemies
- More levels and environments
- More animations

Please leave any feedback/questions/concerns below!

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Click/Left CTRL - Shoot
